00105         return name;

00115         return otype;

00147 
00149     inline int ref() {
00150         return ++nref;
00151     };
00153     inline int deref() {
00154         return --nref;
00155     };

00162 
00168     static void deleteObject(EGS_Object *o) {
00169         if (!o) {
00170             return;
00171         }
00172         if (!o->deref()) {
00173             delete o;
00174         }
00175     };

00206 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ObjectFactory {
00207

00221     EGS_ObjectFactory(const string &dsoPath, int where=0);
00222 
00231     virtual ~EGS_ObjectFactory();
00232 
00239     virtual void addKnownObject(EGS_Object *o) {
00240         if (o) {
00241             o->ref();
00242             known_objects.push_back(o);
00243         }
00244     };
00245 
00268     virtual EGS_Object *createSingleObject(EGS_Input *inp,
00269                                            const char *funcname = 0, bool unique = true);
00270

00299                               const string &object_delimeter, const string &select_key,
00300                               const char *funcname = 0, bool unique = true);
00301

00319

00334     void removeObject(EGS_Object *o);

00343     virtual bool addObject(EGS_Object *o, bool unique = true);
00344 
00348     void addKnownTypeId(const char *typeid_name);
00349 
00351     int  nObjects() const {
00352         return objects.size();
00353     };
00354 
00356     EGS_Object *getObject(int j) {
00357         return (j>=0 && j<objects.size()) ? objects[j] : 0;
00358     };
00359 
00360 protected:
00361

00369 
00380 template <class T>
00381 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_TypedObjectFactory : public EGS_ObjectFactory {
00382 
00383 public:
00384 
00385     EGS_TypedObjectFactory(const string &dsoPath, const string &type,
00386                            int where=0) :
00387         EGS_ObjectFactory(dsoPath,where), otype(type) {};
00388     ~EGS_TypedObjectFactory() {};
00389 
00390     bool isKnownTypeId(EGS_Object *o) const {
00391         for (int j=0; j<known_typeids.size(); j++) {
00392             if (known_typeids[j] == typeid(*o).name()) {
00393                 return true;
00394             }
00395         }
00396         return false;
00397     };
00398 
00399     bool isMyObjectType(EGS_Object *o, const char *func) {
00400         if (!o) {
00401             return false;
00402         }
00403         T *t = dynamic_cast<T *>(o);
00404         bool res;
00405         if (t) {
00406             res = true;
00407         }
00408         else {
00409             res = isKnownTypeId(o);
00410         }
00411         if (!res && func) egsWarning("EGS_TypedObjectFactory::%s:\n"
00412                                          "  dynamic_cast to %s fails for object of type %s\n"
00413                                          "  This object's typeid is also not in the list of know typeids\n",
00414                                          func,otype.c_str(),o->getObjectType().c_str());
00415         return res;
00416     };
00417 
00418     void addKnownObject(EGS_Object *o) {
00419         if (isMyObjectType(o,"addKnownObject()")) {
00420             EGS_ObjectFactory::addKnownObject(o);
00421         }
00422         EGS_ObjectFactory::addKnownObject(o);
00423     };
00424 
00425     EGS_Object *createSingleObject(EGS_Input *i,
00426                                    const char *fname = 0, bool u = true) {
00427         EGS_Object *o = EGS_ObjectFactory::createSingleObject(i,fname,u);
00428         if (o) {
00429             if (!isMyObjectType(o,"createSingleObject()")) {
00430                 delete o;
00431                 o = 0;
00432             }
00433         }
00434         return o;
00435     };
00436 
00437     bool addObject(EGS_Object *o, bool unique = true) {
00438         if (!isMyObjectType(o,"addObject()")) {
00439             return false;
00440         }
00441         return EGS_ObjectFactory::addObject(o,unique);
00442     };
00443 
00444 private:
00445 
00446     string   otype;
00447 
00448 };
00449
